selectedVerses.text: And at the latter end of their kingdom, when the transgressors have reached their limit, a king of bold face, one who understands riddles, shall arise.
Man puts an end to darkness and searches out to the farthest limit the ore in gloom and deep darkness.
I have seen a limit to all perfection, but your commandment is exceedingly broad.Mem
Cush was her strength; Egypt too, and that without limit; Put and the Libyans were her helpers.
Then the border shall extend to Ziphron, and its limit shall be at Hazar-enan. This shall be your northern border.
